panels.description:
Total number of active (healthy) mirror topics.
This metric is only reported by the controller
panels.title: Active Mirror Topics

panels.description:
Total number of mirror topics for which mirroring from the source has been paused.
This metric is only reported by the controller
panels.title: Failed Mirror Topics

panels.description:
Total number of mirror topics for which mirroring from the source has been paused.
This metric is only reported by the controller
panels.title: Paused Mirror Topics

panels.description:
Total number of mirrored topics being stopped .
This metric is only reported by the controller
panels.title: PendingStopped Mirror Topics

panels.description: Total number of active mirrored partitions on all brokers.
panels.title: Online Mirror Partitions

panels.description: Number of mirrored partitions that are blocked on fetching data due to issues on the source cluster.
panels.title: Blocked Mirror Partitions

panels.description: Number of mirrored partitions that are under min ISR.
panels.title: Under Min ISR Mirror Partitions

panels.description: Number of mirrored partitions that are under replicated.
panels.title: Under Replicated Mirror Partitions

panels.description: Rate per second of consumer offsets committed for a cluster link.
panels.title: Cluster Link Consumer Offset Committed Rate

panels.description: Rate per second of times at which the partition count was updated due to source changes.
panels.title: Linked Partition Addition Rate

panels.description: Rate per second of failed consumer offsets commits for a cluster link.
panels.title: Cluster Link Consumer Offset Failed Committed Rate

panels.description: Maximum lag in messages between the replicas on the destination cluster and the leader replica on the source cluster. Provides an indication of overall cluster link health and a relative measure of whether the destination cluster is lagging behind.
panels.title: Link Messages Lag

panels.description: Drill-down of MaxLag, which provides lag in number of messages per replica on the destination cluster from the leader replica on the source cluster. Useful to debug any specific lagging topic partitions/replicas on the destination cluster.
panels.title: Link Messages Lag Per Topic

panels.description: Maximum lag in messages between the replicas on the destination cluster and the leader replica on the source cluster. Provides an indication of overall cluster link health and a relative measure of whether the destination cluster is lagging behind.
panels.title: Link Messages Lag Per Broker

panels.description: Number of dead threads of type ClusterLinkThread, where a dead thread is indicative of an issue with fetching from the source cluster for a partition.
panels.title: Link Fetcher Dead Thread Count

panels.description: Rate at which requests are issued to the source cluster over the cluster link.
panels.title: Link Requests Per Sec

panels.description: Rate at which data is fetched from the source cluster. Indicates amount of throughput in bytes per second on the cluster link.
panels.title: Link Bytes Per Sec

panels.description: Throttle time metrics may indicate that a cluster link connection is being throttled, which is useful for understanding why lag may be increasing over a cluster link.
panels.title: Link Fetch Throttle Time Average

panels.description: Number of connections for a cluster link per destination broker
panels.title: Link Connection Count

panels.description: Rate per second for connections created for the cluster link. If the rate is high, the source cluster may be overloaded with connections.
panels.title: Connection Creation Rate

panels.description: Number of bytes per second received from the source cluster.
panels.title: Link Bytes In

panels.description: Rate per second for connections closed for the cluster link. Can be compared to connection creation to understand the balance of creating/closing connections.
panels.title: Link Connection Close Rate

panels.description: Number of bytes per second sent to the source cluster.
panels.title: Link Bytes Out

panels.description: Rate per second of requests issued to the source cluster over the cluster link.
panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: Number of bytes per second sent to the source cluster.
panels.title: Network I/O

panels.description: Rate per second of responses received from the source cluster over the cluster link.
panels.title: Response Rate

panels.description: Max size in bytes of requests issued to the source cluster over the cluster link.
panels.title: Request Size Max

panels.description: Average size in bytes of requests issued to the source cluster over the cluster link.
panels.title: Request Size Average

panels.description: Statistics of the destination clusters network IO for the requests over the cluster link.
panels.title: I/O Wait Time Average
